entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
